body_html: So it does work after putting zlib.dll into a directory that is referenced in PATH environment variable, but it DOES NOT work when put in directory that is in PYTHONPATH (or something like that) so including DLLs directory.
body_text: So it does work after putting zlib.dll into a directory that is referenced in PATH environment variable, but it DOES NOT work when put in directory that is in PYTHONPATH (or something like that) so including DLLs directory.
body: So it does work after putting zlib.dll into a directory that is referenced in PATH environment variable, but it DOES NOT work when put in directory that is in PYTHONPATH (or something like that) so including DLLs directory.
